channel.title: 667/704 Potion problems~~ A big argument! Help plz!
channel.description:
Ok...so a few days ago... matrix 667/704 was released.
Now, I have a problem where I go to some places, for example, nex, dominion tower, wildy, ect.., and I cannot drink ANY potions...
Does anyone know what file and what code to change?
Many people are asking for the fix. Please...if anyone knows how to fix this and have actually fixed it on their 667/704 server, tell me how.
Thank you.

item.title: 667/704 Potion problems~~ A big argument! Help plz!

item.description:
@1airwolf wrote:

i need to add some potions to the 639 i have like the red prayer pot but i dont know how but this is a good way to lern lol

Read full topic
